name: Jim McMahon
text: When we're driving through on a trip, we stop here every time.  It's a warm and friendly place with great food.

name: Billy Kerfoot
text: Great service. great pizza. They even have games to play while you wait

name: Terry McMahon
text: This is my favorite Pizza Hut...we stop here whenever we travel by.  Pizza always done well, friendly staff and homey, comfy feeling you don't often get at other Pizza Huts.  Can't beat this one!!!üéñÔ∏èüéñÔ∏è

name: terry emery
text: Needs updating and smelled strongly of old grease. Good pizza.

name: Jessica Wecht
text: This location is closed. Since about fall of last year (2018)

name: Daniel Cahalan
text: 2nd time here recently. Horrible management here. Took over an hour to get our food. Some of our food was hot, some cold. I watched the manager lean on the countertops, flirt with some guy who walked in and do her hair instead of do her job ‚Ä¶More

name: Catherine Martin
text: There should be zero stars... but I worked there... so I guess ill be nice. The tables were sticky and never cleaned. The place was a mess and the food wasn't correctly refrigerated.

name: David Clutter
text: They love the snow fighters and the girls are really friendly and beautiful!

name: Vinny DeFrancesco
text: Hit or miss. Usually pretty quick but quality is inconsistent

name: Kyle Greenville
text: You know what your going to get at a pizza hut.  I have never had a bad experience at this location.

name: Janet
text: Do yourself a favor and stay away from this Pizza Hut unless you want food poisoning.  My husband picked up a pizza from there and commented when it wouldn't slide off the spatula that it was done.  The shift manager, Mary, told him that is ‚Ä¶More

name: Johnny Schwartz
text: This was one of the greatest food experiences i have ever had in my entire life. Shawn Whiteman was my waiter and he was SO entertaining, he made such a good pizza. It melted in my mouth as i licked all around it, staring into his dreamy ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Stern
text: Jake was our waiter and he was the best! The food was ok but our waiter made the experience amazing!!!!

name: Para
text: jake was amazing, he is the most respectful and nice waiter i think i ever had, give that man a raise! take my money jake!

name: William Daily
text: Service and pizza were fine but the two orders of French fries were a little burnt.

text: This place is cool you can chill with the servers and listen to music some servers leave stuff for other coworkers to do tho and it‚Äôs sad

text: Food was good staff was üëç.

text: Everyone there is great! But my waitress I had there Candace Jolley was soooo amazing she got everything right!!

name: Ann Leaf
text: Fed up!  Tired of trying to order pizza online.  The online order doesn't work half the time and you can't get the same "deals" when you call direct.  Seriously seems like a scam and I am tired of trying to purchase pizza from this place when it isn't even that good to start with!

name: Billie Whited
text: OUT OF BUSINESS.  CLOSED. PIZZA HUT AT THE LISBON SHOPPING CENTER CLOSED THE END OF AUGUST 2018.   NOTE ON DOOR - THEY WERE UNABLE TO COME TO TERMS WITH SHOPPING CENTER OWNER.

text: Like the fireplace and the older style layout.

name: Nick F
text: Brittany lied. I'd pick Tonys over it.
